review: Dr. Surbhi patienly listened, and treated very professionally. She has profound knowledge and vast experience.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Wisdom Tooth Extraction,
review:
Dr. Surbhi and Dr. Amandeep are amazing doctors and amazing people. They examined my situation well and provided me with a good treatment plan. Even after being super busy they gave me appointments according to my convenience. They are highly professional yet super understanding and friendly. They maintain good hygiene in the clinic and ask if I need water every single time I visit. 
My previous dentist didn’t do RTC properly which they corrected and I was relieved from my pain. 
Both the doctors are very comforting and respectful.
I am thankful that I have come across such amazing doctors and wonderful people. 💖

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr Surbhi Anand is brilliant! Friendly and putting my anxiety at ease, she continued to complete the procedure with care and precision. Overall, a wonderful doctor that comes highly recommended! Kudos Doc

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr Surbhi is one of *** ******, patient and most meticulous doctor I have come across in my life. She changed my world view of what dentists look like and are like. I wouldn't want to go to another dentist now after my wonderful experience with her. She explained the problems and treatment to me through the process unlike most doctors. Her finesse is evident as my denture was a tricky one to fix but she did it flawlessly. Post the treatment she even followed up with me to ensure I was doing well. Her fees is also cost-effective *** * ********* ******* *** ** *** ** *** **** ******* ** *****

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: i had contacted dr. amandeep and dr surabhi for my husband and mother in law's wisdom tooth issues. I must say, we (as a family) found best doctor in dental speciality. The diagnosis was perfect in 1st visit and they explained every thing so perfectly that all the fear gone away. My husband and mother in law then went for tooth extraction in 2nd visit and that experience was also very good. patient did not felt any pain during the process and even after hours of process which was the best part of whole experience. i must recommend Dr surabhi and amandeep for all type of dental problems.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I visited Dr. Surbhi Anand during the second phase of the lockdown. She performed a root canal and alleviated severe pain. The clinic is well-equipped - especially with regard to COVID-related precautions.

Dr. Anand has a pleasant demeanour, and she takes the time to explain the treatment - its nuances, choices available, and their pros and cons. She does not push her own point-of-view; rather, she allows patients to reach an informed decision.

I was impressed by her clinical ability, and was fully satisfied with the treatment offered. I plan to switch to Dental Bliss for all upcoming dental needs.
Dr. Surbhi patienly listened, and treated very professionally. She has profound knowledge and vast experience.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,

Dr Surbhi took great care to save the tooth to avoid a root canal, and explained the procedure in details, would have ended up with two root canals otherwise. I would highly recommend dental bliss.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: A visit to the dentist always seems scary in general but Dr. Surbhi was very calm, composed, patient and friendly and I was not overwhelmed during my procedure at all. She kept the procedure comfortable and gave a heads-up whenever there was going to be anything which could even be slightly painful. I had surprisingly comfortable procedure (and RCTs can be scary I know that). Thank you.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Visited Dr Surbhi for my root canal. She was very helpful, attentive, well informed and friendly which made the whole process easier for me as it was my first root canal. She carefully listened to all my queries. The clinic was also kept well sanitized. The staff present in the clinic was also very helpful. She even called to keep a check after the procedure was over. Would definitely recommend her to anyone who is having any trouble with their teeth.

tags: Wait time,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
review:
I visited Dental bliss amid lockdown. I called the clinic and had an conversation with Dr.Anand, her way of explaining the issues was so pleasing. On the very next day i visited the clinic and got my teeth fixed. 
I had the best treatment and Dr.Anand is so amazing. She at first checked my teeth and pointed out the issues which i later need to fixed them & for that i will visit her soon. Then she started my treatment and it was so good. She is super friendly,skilled and professional.
I would highly recommend her.
Regards.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr. Surbhi is really kind, organised and patient. I had been to multiple dentists before deciding on Dental Bliss as I couldn’t find a dentist whom I was comfortable with. 

The clinic is super clean. During covid times, they ensure patients are spaced out,  clinic is constantly sanitized and provide PPE suits for the patients too. 

Both Dr. Aman and Dr. Surbhi are always more than happy to answer all the questions patiently, and explain the procedure. They are also extremely thorough and ensure that there is minimum pain and discomfort. They have also been ever so kind, to follow up and be available for any queries post the treatment. 

I would definitely recommend them to every person, and would trust them completely with my dental health.
She’s such a calm person, so friendly.. loved meeting her for the first time. Would always recommend her. To me Her first impression was outstanding 👍
reply_text: Thank you for such kind words Suruchi. All the best for your future & hope you a have a safe and healthy year ahead. Sending lots of good vibes 😊😊
